description.text:
Join Core Brands on the Summer Tour 2014. With new gear taking the stage and new programs to announce, this will be a show you don’t want to miss! 

On the main stage: 
New ELAN System Controllers 
New ELAN Ultra-Matrix A/V Switchers 
New Multi-Room Controller From Niles 
New User Interfaces From Niles 
New Power Amplifiers From Speakercraft 
New Sunfire Subwoofers 
Also taking the stage are our new dealer programs, including our enhanced Add-a-Brand program to make it more profitable for you to work with multiple brands for Core Brands. 
We look forward to seeing you at the show.

ticket_classes.name: Seattle Roadshow 2014

description.text: Core Brands combines the product innovation and marketing strengths of iconic and award-winning audio, power management and control brands to deliver a portfolio of connected home solutions that delight our dealers and end-users. These brands include ELAN®, SpeakerCraft®, Furman®, BlueBOLT®, Korus™, Niles®, Panamax®, Proficient®, Sunfire®, Xantech® and ATON®.
